text: hananim-eun yeoleo sedaeleul il-eu kieo olaen sewol-eul duni malsseum-eul mang gaghayeossdeola geudaega madeuyan-ui baeg seong gaunde geojuhaji ani haess-euna geudaeege gyesihanani hananim mal-eul geudeul-ege nangsonghala geudaeleul seonjija lo hayeo malsseum-eul bonaen janeun balo hananim-isila
